results.deck: Tales of Symphonia is a cel-shaded action RPG and is another game in Namco's Tales series. It expands upon the series' battle system and emphasizes on relationships with other characters by the decisions you make throughout the game.
results.name: Tales of Symphonia

results.deck: The MLB 2K series returns for the 2007 season with this installment.
results.name: Major League Baseball 2K7

results.deck: Gran Turismo HD was the first foray for Gran Turismo on the PS3.
results.name: Gran Turismo HD

results.deck: Heavy Rain is an adventure game sporting a storyline that appears to adapt to the choices of the player. It was developed by French studio Quantic Dream.
results.name: Heavy Rain

results.deck: Juiced 2: Hot Import Nights is a racing video game for various platforms.
results.name: Juiced 2: Hot Import Nights

results.deck: The latest and possible the last in the College 2K series. Many improvements are subtle, but the changes and additions to College Hoops 2K8 make it the best game in the series.
results.name: College Hoops 2K8

results.deck: NHL 09 adds major improvements to the franchise, such as the defense skill stick and the highly praised Be A Pro Mode, to make this sports game one of the best of 2008.
results.name: NHL 09

results.deck: X-Blades is a third-person hack-and-slash action title featuring a scantily-clad heroine who uses her gunblades and spells to destroy everything in her path.
results.name: X-Blades

results.deck: Human Revolution is the third game in the Deus Ex series, a prequel where players take control of augmented security officer Adam Jensen, and investigate attacks against Sarif Industries, a leader in augmentation technology.
results.name: Deus Ex: Human Revolution

results.deck: A second iteration of the SingStar franchise on PlayStation 3, introducing harmonies and PlayStation Portable interaction.
results.name: SingStar: Vol. 2

results.deck: When King Jason's beloved Alceme is murdered at the altar on their wedding day, he embarks on a legendary journey with the greatest heroes of myth in order to find a way to bring her back to life, and get his revenge on the cultists who ordered her death.
results.name: Rise of the Argonauts

results.deck: Madden NFL 08 is the 19th installment in the Madden franchise. While flaunting enhanced graphics, this version also introduced new animations, Hit Stick 2.0, and a player "weapon" mechanic to help distinguish the good from the great.
results.name: Madden NFL 08

results.deck: A tactical, online, third-person shooter, based on the gameplay mechanics of Metal Gear Solid 4.  The game's servers were shut down in June 2012.
results.name: Metal Gear Online

results.deck: Dynasty Warriors meets Gundam in a spin-off of the Dynasty Warriors franchise. Dynasty Warriors: Gundam brings two popular franchises into one game with characters and mobile suits from series ranging from the original Mobile Suit Gundam to G Gundam.
results.name: Dynasty Warriors: Gundam

results.deck: White Knight Chronicles is a mixture of traditional fantasy JRPG and good old fashioned mecha. The story features Leonard, a protagonist who can transform into the White Knight with the use of an ancient technology. The game also allows players to join forces over the internal multiplayer mode, Geonet.
results.name: White Knight Chronicles: International Edition

results.deck: Time Crisis 4 is the fourth installment of the arcade, on-rail, light-gun shooter series developed by Namco. This time, it's back on the PS3 and in arcades.
results.name: Time Crisis 4

results.deck: NBA 2K8 continues a five year legacy as the #1 rated NBA simulation with in-game features that bring basketball to life like never before.
results.name: NBA 2K8

results.deck: Frontier Developments of Elite and LostWinds fame is developing this ambitious action/thriller promising to deliver a story directed by...you.
results.name: The Outsider

results.deck: L.A. Noire is a detective thriller developed by Team Bondi in Australia and published by Rockstar Games.
results.name: L.A. Noire

results.deck: After a mysterious purple beam hits Earth and turns everyone outside into zombies, it's up to you to save humanity from a zombie invasion in this downloadable game from Sony's Japan Studio.
results.name: The Last Guy

results.deck: The King of Fighters XII is the next installment of the popular team fighting franchise, featuring new high-resolution hand-drawn 2D sprites and backgrounds.
results.name: The King of Fighters XII

results.deck: After a zombie virus sweeps across a beautiful island resort, survivors must fight their way to freedom while trying to find out exactly what went down in this open-world first-person action game.
results.name: Dead Island

results.deck: Beginning with the events of Marvel's Secret War and going into Civil War, players will take control of several Marvel characters in this follow up to the first Ultimate Alliance game.
results.name: Marvel Ultimate Alliance 2

results.deck: After a violent death by an unknown force and a timely reanimation by the human supremacist organization Cerberus, Commander Shepard must assemble a new squad in the seedier side of the galaxy for a suicide mission in the second installment of the "Mass Effect" trilogy.
results.name: Mass Effect 2

results.deck: "THE iDOLM@STER" is a Japanese rhythm and simulation game in which the player takes the role of a producer. Originally an arcade game, it was brought to the Xbox 360 in 2007.
results.name: THE iDOLM@STER

results.deck: The Saboteur is a action-packed, free-roaming sandbox game that takes place in Nazi-occupied France during World War II. Drive the Nazis out of Paris through whatever means necessary as Irish mechanic-turned-race-car-driver-turned-soldier-of-fortune Sean Devlin.
results.name: The Saboteur

results.deck: Wanted: Weapons of Fate is a follow-up to the 2008 film which was loosely based on a graphic novel.
results.name: Wanted: Weapons of Fate

results.deck: Designed both as a Blu-ray movie and a video game, WarDevil is a long-in-development action game built for next-generation systems.
results.name: WarDevil: Unleash the Beast Within

results.deck: Sega's popular Initial D franchise now arrives on the Playstation 3 with Initial D: Extreme Stage.
results.name: Initial D: Extreme Stage

results.deck: Portal 2 is the sequel to the acclaimed first-person puzzle game, carrying forward its love of mind-bending problems and its reckless disregard for the space-time continuum.
results.name: Portal 2

results.deck: Operation Flashpoint 2: Dragon Rising is a direct sequel to 2001's hit combat simulation game Operation Flashpoint: Cold War Crisis and the expansion pack Operation Flashpoint: Resistance.
results.name: Operation Flashpoint: Dragon Rising

results.deck: NBA Live 08 is another yearly installment in EA's NBA Live series. The Washington Wizards' Gilbert Arenas is featured on the cover.
results.name: NBA Live 08

results.deck: Based off the manga in japan, Wangan Midnight is a PS3 game that brings the story from the manga to let you play it out yourself.
results.name: Wangan Midnight

results.deck: NHL 2K7 was the seventh game in the series released on Xbox, Xbox360, PlayStation2, and PlayStation3.
results.name: NHL 2K7

results.deck: The famous Monopoly board game comes to the current generation of consoles featuring a variety of new features, including mini-games.
results.name: Monopoly: Here & Now Worldwide Edition

results.deck: BlazBlue is a 2D fighting game released by Arc System Works. With its high resolution sprites and 3D backgrounds, it is widely considered a spiritual sequel to Guilty Gear XX.
results.name: BlazBlue: Calamity Trigger

results.deck: Gran Turismo 5 is the fifth edition in the long running racing game series by Polyphony Digital. The game sports over 1000 vehicles, damage modeling on race cars, a dedicated television channel, lots of races, 16 player online multiplayer, and active weather.
results.name: Gran Turismo 5

results.deck: The episodic game series based on The Watchmen graphic novel and film, featuring Nite Owl and Rorschach. Players brawl their way through six chapters that take place before the events of the film and graphic novel.
results.name: Watchmen: The End is Nigh

results.deck: Elveon was meant to be an action-RPG that followed the saga of an experienced elf warrior as he attempts to liberate the city of Nimathar, but no word has been released on the game since 2008, so it can safely be assumed to be cancelled.
results.name: Elveon

results.deck: NCAA Football 08 is the 11th installment of the franchise. This version sported a new engine and control scheme, allowing for a different gameplay experience than previous iterations.
results.name: NCAA Football 08

results.deck: Cipher Complex is a stealth action game coming to the Xbox 360 and the Playstation 3. It is being developed by Edge of Reality.
results.name: Cipher Complex

results.deck: Faith and a .45 was an action game being developed by independent developer Deadline Games. They planned to release it on Xbox 360 and Playstation 3, but it has since been cancelled.
results.name: Faith and a .45

results.deck: An homage to obscene grindhouse-style movies, WET is a third-person action/shooter soaked in blood and violence. Featuring the voice acting talent of Eliza Dushku & Alan Cumming.
results.name: WET

results.deck: A sci-fi FPS long in development. Released as a Steam Early Access game in July 2013, the full game is slated for release near the end of 2014.
results.name: Interstellar Marines

results.deck: For the 2008 edition of the 2K series, Jason Spezza of the Ottawa Senators was cover athlete.
results.name: NHL 2K8

results.deck: The 13th release in the franchise, Armored Core: for Answer is set ten years after Armored Core 4 and sees the largest machines in Armored Core yet called Arms Forts.
results.name: Armored Core: for Answer

results.deck: The official game of World Snooker for 2007 now includes World Pool Championships as well.
results.name: World Snooker Championship 2007

results.deck: Megazone 23: Aoi Garland is a 2007 PS3 game based on the 1980's cyberpunk anime series set in a post-apocalyptic future.
results.name: Megazone 23: Aoi Garland

results.deck: Sega's Yakuza series moves to the PlayStation 3 for its third installment, bringing all the comically brutal beat-em-up gameplay, Japanese RPG storytelling and various mini-games with it.
results.name: Yakuza 3

results.deck: Nathan Drake returns to find the lost secret of Marco Polo, in this sequel to the 2007 sleeper hit Uncharted: Drake's Fortune.
results.name: Uncharted 2: Among Thieves

results.deck: Return to the dark life of Jackie Estacado in The Darkness II, Digital Extremes' sequel to the 2007 shooter by Starbreeze.
results.name: The Darkness II

results.deck: 2 Days to Vegas is an action game being developed by Steel Monkeys for Xbox 360, PlayStation 3 and PC.
results.name: 2 Days to Vegas

results.deck: Mobile Suit Gundam: Crossfire was a launch title for the PS3. It is considered one of the worst games available on the PlayStation 3.
results.name: Mobile Suit Gundam: Crossfire

results.deck: Altered Species takes you in the role of John Lloyd a Special Forces member looking to eliminate the 7 Nightwalkers.
results.name: Vampire Rain: Altered Species

results.deck: Guitar Hero: Metallica is the second band-specific game in the Guitar Hero franchise. It features 28 songs from the world famous heavy-metal band Metallica, as well as 21 guest acts - picked by Metallica themselves.
results.name: Guitar Hero: Metallica

results.deck: College Hoops 2K7 was the 5th installation of 2K Sports' popular College Hoops line of College Basketball Games.
results.name: College Hoops 2K7

results.deck: SCORE International Baja 1000 is an offroad racing game featuring over 90 vehicles and multiple classes including trophy trucks, class I, motorcycles, and ATVs.
results.name: SCORE International Baja 1000

results.deck: NBA returns for another season featuring improved graphics, new modes, and online play.
results.name: NBA 09: The Inside

results.deck: MotoGP 08 features high-speed motorcycle racing with famous riders and top bike manufacturers, and promises to be more accessible than ever to beginners.
results.name: MotoGP 08

results.deck: 2007's iteration of Sony's first-party exclusive baseball franchise brings the well-regarded gameplay into next-gen with new detailed textures, lifelike player faces, online leagues, weekly roster updates and more on Playstation 3, as well as scaled-back PSP and Playstation 2 versions.
results.name: MLB 07: The Show

results.deck: The tie-in game of the film of the same title. Return to Hogwarts to help Harry survive a fraught sixth year in Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince.
results.name: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince

results.deck: Battle Fantasia is a 2D fighting game with fantasy RPG aesthetics developed by Arc System Works for the PlayStation 3, Xbox 360 and arcades.
results.name: Battle Fantasia

results.deck: Step into the shoes of real-life Navy SEAL legend Dick Marcinko in this foul-mouthed first-person shooter from Rebellion and Bethesda Softworks.
results.name: Rogue Warrior

results.deck: TimeO is a an action adventure game about two New York City urban explorers who discover an entrance to a parallel world in which they must battle to survive encounters with armies of hostile robots and malevolent, ambulatory buildings.
results.name: TimeO

results.deck: The second installment in the Assassin's Creed franchise follows the life of Ezio Auditore da Firenze as he seeks revenge on those who betrayed his family.
results.name: Assassin's Creed II

results.deck: A steampunk-styled action-adventure from indie developer Fuzzyeyes Studio. In development since 2006, it has been delayed, cancelled, and uncancelled several times, and currently has no announced release date.
results.name: Edge of Twilight

results.deck: Splatterhouse revisits Rick Taylor as he tries to rescue his girlfriend Jennifer from the evil clutches of Dr. West.  In the process, he must battle against evil beings known as the "Corrupted" in bloody and brutal combat.
results.name: Splatterhouse

results.deck: Heat was a video game coming to, "next generation platforms," based on the movie of the same name. Originally announced as a Gearbox developed title in 2006, development has since been put on hold.
results.name: Heat

results.deck: Experience a Japanese boy's traditional summer vacation set in the 20th century in Hokkaido. It is part of the Boku no Natsuyasumi series and was released in Japan on July 5, 2007.
results.name: Boku no Natsuyasumi 3: Hokkoku Hen: Chiisana Boku no Dai Sougen

results.deck: The second Samurai Warriors title sees an expanded roster and new selection of battlefields. Players fight through campaigns focused on historical figures of the Warring States era.
results.name: Samurai Warriors 2

results.deck: The Lord of the Rings: The White Council was an RPG in development at EA Redwood Shores (now Visceral Games), until its cancellation. The game was to be set in Middle-earth at a time before Bilbo Baggins discovers the One Ring.
results.name: The Lord of the Rings: The White Council

results.deck: Saw is a survival horror video game based on the popular movie franchise of the same name in which players will encounter familiar characters and solve puzzles to progress. Developed by Zombie Studios and published by Konami, the game runs on the Unreal Engine 3.
results.name: SAW

results.deck: TV Show King is a WiiWare trivia game. Multiple choice questions and spinning a wheel are the highlights. It also heavily uses Miis.
results.name: TV Show King

results.deck: Batman: Arkham Asylum puts you behind the cowl of the iconic Dark Knight, fighting his way through Arkham Asylum to stop the Joker from enacting a sinister plot that would have grave consequences for Gotham City.
results.name: Batman: Arkham Asylum

results.deck: Clannad is a visual novel developed by Key and released on April 2004 in Japan, first on the PC and later on the PS2 in 2006 and the PSP and Xbox 360 in 2008. With an acclaimed interactive narrative revolving around a family theme, it was adapted into an equally acclaimed anime series.
results.name: Clannad

results.deck: A spin-off of Clannad which expands on the story of Tomoyo Sakagami, one of the heroines of the original title. Features a strategy RPG mini-game which has its own story.
results.name: Tomoyo After: It's a Wonderful Life

results.deck: A visual novel developed by Key for the PC. Rewrite is Key's ninth game.
results.name: Rewrite

results.deck: Shellshock 2: Blood Trails is the sequel to Guerrilla Game's Shellshock: Nam '67. It shifts the perspective to first-person and the genre to "survival horror." It takes place in Cambodia during the time of the Vietnam Conflict.
results.name: Shellshock 2: Blood Trails

results.deck: Dirty Harry (working title) was a game cited as coming to the Xbox360 and PS3, however the game has been significantly delayed and subsequently cancelled due to problems with the developer. Warner Bros. Interactive still intend to produce the game at a later date.
results.name: Dirty Harry

results.deck: The sequel to Overlord, this is a unique and strategic Adventure game that allows control of an Overlord character who possesses mischief-making, loyal minions that bid his doing of evil or good.
results.name: Overlord II

results.deck: Savage Moon is a tower defense game in which the player is tasked to protect a mining facility on a distant moon from the onslaught of an insectoid alien race.
results.name: Savage Moon

results.deck: An MMORPG that was being developed by South Korean company Webzen for PC and PlayStation 3. The project was scrapped in 2006.
results.name: Endless Saga

results.deck: This open-world crime sequel follows the events of the second film and attempts to make you act like a mobster and think like a Don in the Godfather universe.
results.name: The Godfather II

results.deck: The long-awaited third Max Payne game finally arrived in May 2012, courtesy of Rockstar Vancouver. Eight years after the end of Max Payne 2, an aging, burnt-out Max finds one last chance to redeem himself while working as a bodyguard for a rich family in Brazil.
results.name: Max Payne 3

results.deck: The latest entry House of the Dead series, now with a grindhouse twist.  "It's not just good, it's f**king DE-LICIOUS!"
results.name: The House of the Dead: OVERKILL

results.deck: Fuel is an open-world racing game featuring 5,000-plus miles of open road and drastic weather like tornados and blizzards.
results.name: FUEL

results.deck: EyePet uses the PlayStation Eye camera (and PlayStation Move controller in later versions) to allow a virtual pet to interact with people and objects in the real world.
results.name: EyePet

results.deck: SingStar: Queen is a SingStar title featuring songs by the band Queen.
results.name: SingStar: Queen

results.deck: To Heart 2 is a visual novel by Aquaplus.
results.name: To Heart 2

results.deck: Railfan is a train simulator featuring real life footage.
results.name: Railfan

results.deck: The third iteration of the SingStar franchise on PlayStation 3.
results.name: SingStar Vol. 3: Party Edition

results.deck: Dynasty Warriors: Gundam 2 is the sequel to Bandai and Koei's Gundam/Dynasty Warriors mash-up.
results.name: Dynasty Warriors: Gundam 2

results.deck: Death Orb has appeared in episode one, episode two, and episode three of the Playstation virtual magazine Qore, each time with various enhancements and upgrades. Death Orb could be described as Pong 2.0.
results.name: Death Orb

results.deck: A crossover RPG featuring characters from Darkstalkers, Disgaea, Atelier Marie, Mana Khemia and many other series, with a turn-based combat system and costume-based "forms."
results.name: Cross Edge

results.deck: In this reboot of the beloved Castlevania franchise, Gabriel Belmont goes on a quest to defeat the sinister Lords of Shadow, who are preventing the souls of the departed from passing on to the afterlife, in order to obtain from them a magical mask that will bring his murdered wife Marie back from the dead.
results.name: Castlevania: Lords of Shadow

results.deck: A crucial planet size factory is under siege by millions of Orks. As Space Marine Captain Titus, you must lead your soldiers to stem the tide until help arrives.
results.name: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine

results.deck: Dynasty Warriors over the internet. You pick your character and weapon and fight to gain experience.
results.name: Dynasty Warriors Online: Dance of the Divine General

results.deck: ArcaniA: Gothic 4 is the 4th installment in the European Action RPG franchise Gothic, and the first after JoWood's split with the original franchise developer.
results.name: Arcania: Gothic 4

results.deck: Tekken 6: Bloodline Rebellion is an updated version of Tekken 6 for arcades, which has also been ported to PS3, Xbox 360 and PSP. The home console releases have been released simply as "Tekken 6".
results.name: Tekken 6: Bloodline Rebellion

results.deck: This disc-based Rock Band pack brings downloadable content to those of you who can't (or won't) get it online.
results.name: Rock Band Track Pack Volume 2
